meanings.definition: To abandon one's country or cause in favor of an opposing one.
meanings.sent1: The soldier was defecting to the enemy camp.
meanings.sent2: She was caught defecting to the rival nation.
meanings.sent3: The spy's plan involved defecting to the other side for a new mission.
meanings.sent4: The politician's sudden defecting shocked everyone in the country.
meanings.sent5: The act of defecting can have serious consequences on national security.

meanings.definition: To abandon a position or duty.
meanings.sent1: The employee was defecting from his responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: He risked his job by defecting from his role.
meanings.sent3: Defecting from his duties, he decided to take an unauthorized break.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of defecting from tasks led to constant reprimands.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of defecting from your duties can be severe.

meanings.definition: To abandon a team or organization.
meanings.sent1: The player was defecting from his team to join a rival.
meanings.sent2: She was considering defecting from the club due to disagreements.
meanings.sent3: Defecting from the group, he sought a new organization to join.
meanings.sent4: Her act of defecting from the team caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent5: The impact of defecting from a team can affect team dynamics significantly.
